query:
SELECT pt.id, pt.customerId, pt.txid, pt.amount, pt.status, pt.paidAt, pt.createdAt
FROM pix_transactions pt
WHERE pt.txid = 'f76786d04e5d44508fd50305c8a062ee'
LIMIT 1;

mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 35dchGD4KrPJFby.4046de8efa3e --database SoKyCCsEmaEjcFkVqbEFR7 --execute SELECT pt.id, pt.customerId, pt.txid, pt.amount, pt.status, pt.paidAt, pt.createdAt
FROM pix_transactions pt
